author: Robert Conroy
content: Great man. Great friend. Truly a man you donâ€™t meet everyday.

author: Sheila Ewall
content: I partook at the sea shanteys at south st seaport museum. I was shocked and saddened to learn of frank woerners passing. He was a great song leader and put his songs across very well. I want to convey my condolences and express my heartfelt sympathy to his family, friends, relatives,etc. He will be sorely missed.

author: Daniel Aguiar
content: I’ll always remember Frank and all the good times we had singing together! He was always ready to share his music and friendship. I wish him safe harbor forever!
